SEARCH
Package controller

Klasse Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IController
public class Controller extends Object implements IController
The Controller class manages the interaction between the OthelloGame model and the user interface (view). It handles the game state transitions, user input processing, and updates the view accordingly.

The controller implements the IController interface, providing methods to control the flow of the game.

Example Usage: 


 // Create a new Controller with a specified view
 IView view = // ... initialize the view
 Controller controller = new Controller(view);

 // Advance to the next frame of the game
 controller.nextFrame();

 // Process user input (e.g., key presses or mouse clicks)
 controller.userInput('a', KeyEvent.VK_A);

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Controller

      public Controller(IView view)
      Constructs a Controller with the specified view.
      Parameter:
      view - The view to be associated with the controller.

  • Methodendetails

    • nextFrame

      public void nextFrame()
      Advances the game to the next frame based on its current state. Draws the appropriate view for the current game state.
      Angegeben von:
      nextFrame in Schnittstelle IController

    • userInput

      public void userInput(processing.event.KeyEvent event)
      Processes user input for key events. Initiates the game if the state is START and the Enter key is pressed.
      Angegeben von:
      userInput in Schnittstelle IController
      Parameter:
      event - The code representing the key.

    • userInput

      public void userInput(int x, int y)
      Processes user input for mouse events. Handles player moves during the PLAYING state and checks for game over conditions.
      Angegeben von:
      userInput in Schnittstelle IController
      Parameter:
      x - The x-coordinate of the mouse click.
      y - The y-coordinate of the mouse click.

    • newGame

      public void newGame()
      Angegeben von:
      newGame in Schnittstelle IController

    • getGame

      public OthelloGame getGame()
      Gets the current OthelloGame instance associated with the controller.
      Angegeben von:
      getGame in Schnittstelle IController
      Gibt zurück:
      The OthelloGame instance.
